about_the_game:
Step onto the desolate shores of an isolated Norwegian Island, a place shrouded in mystery and haunted by the remnants of a forgotten past. Once a thriving fishing community, the island now lies in eerie silence.

As you explore the abandoned island, each clue, note, and hidden relic unveils more of its dark history. From dark lighthouses to abandoned homes, every corner holds pieces of the lives that once flourished here—before everything fell into ruin. What dark force shattered the lives of the Island's people? Can you withstand the darkness and discover the answers waiting in its depths?

You are not alone. A relentless monster hunts you through the shadows, its presence felt in every creak and whisper, closing in when you least expect it. With no weapons to defend yourself, you must use your wits to evade its clutches, hiding and outsmarting it at every turn. This creature is drawn to light and sound, forcing you to tread carefully as you solve puzzles and uncover secrets.

The island's eerie ambiance, combined with the immersive power of VR, creates a visceral horror experience that places you right in the heart of a terrifying mystery. Feel the fear build with every creak, shadow, and chilling detail as you navigate a dynamic environment, it's interactivity designed to immerse you fully in this haunted, yet beautiful world.

The darkness is vast, and light is a precious, fragile thing. As you explore, your light will help you reveal hidden clues, navigate complex environments, and stave off the creature that hunts you. But beware—using light recklessly may attract unwanted attention. Finding a balance between visibility and safety is essential to your survival. In Project Lost Island, the simple act of carrying a light becomes a constant tension between discovery and risk, a reminder that in this world, even light can be a double-edged sword.

Use light to reveal the hidden history of the island, unveiling ghostly projections that recount the lives and struggles of those who vanished. Each flicker uncovers fragments of the island’s tragic story, drawing you deeper into its mystery and pushing you closer to the truth. Shine your light, confront the darkness, and piece together the secrets lost to time.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700, AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 12 GB GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX 2070, AMD Radeon RX 5700
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • VR Support: Oculus Quest 3, 3S, 2, Valve Index, Pico 4, 4 Ultra
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-11700K, AMD Ryzen 7 5700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX 3060, AMD Radeon RX 6600
  • DirectX: Version 12

short_description: Project Lost Island is a psychological VR horror game about unraveling the mystery of an abandoned island. Navigate dark, haunting environments, evade a relentless monster, and use light to uncover hidden stories that piece together the island’s tragic history.
